trans-unit.source: Whenever Weatherlight deals combat damage to a player, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a historic card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
trans-unit.target: 每当晴空号对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以展示其中的一张史迹牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。（神器、传奇和传纪是史迹。）
